data.title: List of current and former members who have married
data.text:
The page lists former members of AKB48, Sakamichi Series, SNH48, and their respective groups who have gotten married since leaving.

This list also includes members who are divorced, such as Maeda Atsuko, and members who were engaged to marry but ultimately did not, such as Imaizumi Yui.

AKB48 members

Kawasaki Nozomi married male model Alexander on February 22, 2013. She had her first son on August 29, 2017 and a daughter on October 23, 2020.

Nakanishi Rina got married in June 2013 and had a daughter, Airi.

Watanabe Shiho got married in September 2014.

Tsukamoto Mariko of Otona AKB48 was already married when she joined the group.

Kikuchi Ayaka married a non-celebrity man in December 2014, and had her first child on April 30, 2015. She is now mother to two sons and one daughter.

Komori Mika married a gym trainer in December 2014. She had her first daughter on August 4, 2015 and her second daughter on January 10, 2018.

Imai Yu got married in May 2016. She had her first son in August 12, 2017 and a daughter on June 6, 2020.

Usami Yuki got married on February 9, 2017. She had her first son on May 18, 2019.

Uriya Akane got married on November 5, 2017.

Sato Natsuki got married in June 2017. She had her first son on March 15, 2018, and her second son on October 6, 2020.

Maeda Atsuko married Katsuji Ryo (Japanese actor) on July 31, 2018, and had her first son on March 4, 2019. They divorced on May 23, 2021.

Sato Amina got married on February 1, 2019.

Kawaei Rina married Hirose Tomoki (Japanese actor) on May 17, 2019, and had her first child on November 8, 2019.

Takajo Aki got married to Takahashi Yuji (Japanese football player for Sagan Tosu) on February 15, 2019, and had her first child in November, 2019.

Shinoda Mariko got married on February 16, 2019 and had her first daughter on April 1, 2020. They separated in 2022.

Takahashi Minami got married to a non-celebrity on May 1, 2019.

Saeki Mika got married a non-celebrity man on October 22, 2019. She gave birth to her first child on September 1, 2021.

Suzuki Shihori got married in autumn 2019.

Hoshino Michiru got married on February 2, 2020.

Akimoto Sayaka married to PUNPEE (Japanese rapper) on June 20, 2020. On October 6th, 2023, announced the birth of her first child (a boy).

Itano Tomomi married to Takahashi Keiji (Japanese baseball player) in January, 2021 and announced the birth of their daughter on October 10th, 2021.

Moriyama Sakura got married on June 12, 2021, and announced her pregnancy.

Kasai Tomomi announced her engagement on July 2, 2021. She announced her marriage to Koyama Keita (Japanese actor) on December 28, 2021 via Instagram. On February 17, 2022, announced her first pregnancy. On June 12, 2022, she announced the birth of her first-born daughter.

Kobayashi Kana married a non-celebrity on July 8, 2021. She announced the birth of their son on March 16, 2022.

Oshima Yuko married Hayashi Kento (Japanese actor) on July 29, 2021. In August 2022, they announced Yuko's pregnancy. On January 5th, 2023, they announced the birth of their first child.

Yamada Nanami announced her marriage and pregnancy on November 24, 2021. Her baby boy was born in April, but his exact birth date wasn't revealed (announced on April 23, 2022).

Hayano Kaoru got married on January 11, 2022.

Narita Risa announced her marriage to a non-celebrity on April 24, 2022.

Minegishi Minami announced her marriage to the YouTuber Tetsuya on August 16, 2022. On July 14, 2024, announced the birth of her first child (a daughter).

Nishino Miki announced her marriage to Yoshimotozaka46 member Yamamoto Keiichi on November 22, 2022.

Kojima Natsuki announced her marriage to a non-celebrity on December 24, 2022. On May 25th, 2024, announced the birth of her first child.

Kobayashi Marina announced her marriage to Niizato Ryo (Japanese soccer player) on February 13th, 2023.

Uemura Ayako announced her marriage to a non-celebrity on June 12, 2023.

Shimada Haruka announced her marriage to a non-celebrity on November 22, 2023. On May 12th, 2024, announced the birth of her first child.

Kojima Mako announced her marriage to Kido Yuya (Japanese actor) on January 6th, 2024.

Oya Shizuka announced her marriage to Iwata Ryo (Japanese actor) on April 19th, 2024.

Owada Nana announced her marriage to a non-celebrity on June 13th, 2024.

SKE48 members

Furukawa Airi, got married in 2017 and has a child.

Kaneko Shiori, married Sekine Takahiro in January 2017.

Nakanishi Yuka, got married in November 2017.

Sato Mieko, announced her marriage to a university classmate on November 11, 2017. She had her first daughter on May 9, 2021.

Fujimoto Mitsuki, got married in January 2018, and had her first son on August 19, 2019.

Kinoshita Yukiko, got married on April 25, 2018, and had her first daughter on September 12, 2018.

Matsumura Kaori, got married in Summer 2019.

Yagami Kumi, got married in August 2019.

Sato Sumire, married Aitaka Ryo (Japanese heavyweight kickboxer) on January 1, 2021. She had her first child, a daughter, on June 24, 2021, and her second, a boy, on September 6, 2023.

Kato Tomoko, got married on July 22, 2022.

Sato Seira, got married on December 22, 2022 and had her first daughter on April 30, 2023.

Azuma Rion, got married on August 9, 2023.

Matsui Rena, announced her marriage to singer song-writer Kondo Akihisa on January 1, 2024.

NMB48 members

Matsuda Shiori, got married on April 4, 2017.

Murakami Ayaka, announced her marriage to a man she met in a work-related activity on May 16, 2017.

Kishino Rika, announced her marriage to Taito Nakahigashi (basketball player) on January 5, 2018, and had her first son on August 1, 2018.

Suto Ririka, got married on April 13, 2018 (Announcement at the AKB48 9th Senbatsu Sousenkyo).

Ogasawara Mayu, got married on October 24, 2021. As she had already retired from the entertainment industry, the news was revealed by fellow NMB48 1st Generation member Watanabe Miyuki via her Instagram Story.

Kadowaki Kanako announced her marriage to a non-celebrity man on July 25th, 2023.

Yoshida Akari announced her marriage to a non-celebrity man on April 6th, 2024.

HKT48 members

Okada Kanna got married on November 11, 2018 in the Maldives.

Tsutsui Riko married Nakamura Shin (baseball player for SoftBank Hawks) on August 8, 2020.

Sugamoto Yuko got married with Tanaka on December 7, 2022.

NGT48 members

Kitahara Rie, got married to Kasahara Hideyuki (Japanese actor) on September 29, 2021.

SDN48 members

Tanisaki Tomomi married a hairdresser from Aomori on June 15, 2012, and her had first child in January, 2013.

Chen Qu married a man she dated since shortly after her SDN48 debut. She announced her marriage on March 31, 2013, at SDN's revival stage and showed off the ring at the Omoidaseru Kimitachi e ～AKB48 Group Zenkouen～, 2 months later.

Ohori Megumi, married screenwriter Kanazawa Tatsuya in Hawaii in August 2013, and had her first daughter in June 2014.

Kondo Sayaka, married boat racer Baba Tsuyoshi in 2015, and had a child in December of that year. They got divorced in 2018.

Kouchi Masami, got married on December 11, 2015. She had her first daughter on February 3, 2017.

Hatakeyama Chisaki, got married in 2017.

Kato Mami, married a non-celebrity in 2018, and had her first child on October 3, 2019. She performed at SDN's 10th anniversary show while pregnant, appearing in only two songs.

Natsuko, announced her marriage on December 8, 2018. She gave birth to her first child on May 22, 2021.

Siyeon, got married on May 29, 2019. She gave birth to a son on January 29, 2021.

Kojo Seara, married a non-celebrity man on August 2, 2019. She had her first child, a girl, on September 26, 2020. She had a son on August 21, 2021.

Noro Kayo, got married on November 22, 2020.

Kaida Juri, announced her marriage to Matsumoto Yuki (baseball player) on January 16, 2021.

Kohara Haruka, announced her marriage to Ogasawara Ken (Japanese actor) as well as the birth of their first child on May 25, 2021.

KONAN announced her marriage to a non-celebrity on August 20, 2023.

JKT48 members

Nurhalima Oktavianti, first former member of JKT48 to get married and have a child. Her son, Hana Humaira Arianto, was born on August 19, 2016.

Rica Leyona, married a Japanese man on August 20, 2016.

Stella Cornelia, married Fendy Chow (Indonesian actor) married on July 23, 2017.

Intania Pratama Ilham, got married on April 9, 2018.

Cleopatra, married Panji Pradhana Ramadhan (Indonesian businessman) on April 22, 2018 and had her first daughter on September 13, 2018.

Dena Siti Rohyati, got married on April 29, 2018 and had a daughter on February 22, 2019.

Melody Nurramdhani Laksani, married Hanif Fathoni on November 3, 2018.

Devi Kinal Putri, married Geraldi M. Murod on March 9, 2019.

Elaine Hartanto, married Indra on March 23, 2019.

Jessica Vania, married Echa Soemantri (drummer and member of Trisum, an Indonesian Jazz Band Group) on April 3, 2019.

Diasta Priswarini, married Akira Kimura (Japanese-Indonesian comedian) on July 6, 2019.

Sendy Ariani, married Gean Sumantri on August 3, 2019.

Shinta Naomi, married Ongki Arifin on August 30, 2020.

Andela Yuwono, married Steven Mursalim on October 10, 2020.

Jessica Veranda, married Willy Thomas on December 7, 2022.

Currently engaged

Siti Gayatri, engaged to Saktyo Toerhutomo since March 16, 2019

Riskha Fairunissa, engaged to Rendy Winoto since March 17, 2019

MNL48 Members

Daniella Mae Palmero, first former member of MNL48 to have a child. On February 14, 2022, she announced on her TikTok account that she gave birth to a girl. She currently lives with her boyfriend.

Lorraine Leigh Lacumba, first former member of MNL48 to get married. She got married on November 25, 2023.

SGO48 Members

Lê Nguyễn Phụng Nhi, first former member of SGO48 to get married. She got married on August 4, 2023.

Nogizaka46 members

Hatanaka Seira, first former member of Nogizaka46 to marry. She married a non-celebrity from Yamaguchi prefecture in the autumn of 2017.

Eto Misa, married Genda Sosuke (baseball player for Saitama Seibu Lions) in October 2019.

Wakatsuki Yumi, married actor Tamaoki Reo on December 10, 2021.

Keyakizaka46 members

Imaizumi Yui, announced her engagement to Watanabe Mahoto (YouTuber) in January 2021, and had her first child in June 2021. After the birth of her child, announced she would not be getting married. However, in a YouTube video by Watanabe Mahoto's ex employer from March 2024, the ex employer told viewers that the pair did get married in the end and also had a second child. According to him, they got a divorce in February 2024. As Imaizumi had retired from the entertainment industry at this point, she did not make a public confirmation of these statements.

Hinatazaka46 members

Iguchi Mao, married a non-celebrity man on January 17, 2022. They had their first child, a daughter, in December 2022.

Yoshimotozaka46 members

Murakami Shoji (still active), is divorced. His daughter is artist and actress TSUMIKI☆YANKE (Formerly Nyunyuuyuuuuu).

Ken (still active), is divorced.

Oochi Yosuke (still active), is married (unclear when).

Kawashima of Legend (still active), married a non-celebrity Korean woman (unclear when). They had their first child, a daughter, in 2015.

Nozawa Naoko has been married since the 90s to a French-Canadian guitarist named Bob. They have three children together, including mixed martial artist Shinju Nozawa-Auclair.

Shimada Tamayo (still active), has been divorced twice. She married a Yoshimoto Kogyo employee in April 1998, but they divorced in August 2005. Afterwards, she remarried, but divorced again on April 22, 2013. She had a daughter on June 25, 2008.

Tetsuji (still active), married model Mikami Junko on February 14, 2001. They have two daughters.

Endo Shozo (still active), was married to Chiaki (tarento) from 2002 to 2007 and had one daughter with her. He married a non-celebrity woman on December 25, 2015 and they had one son in the summer of 2016.

Koumoto Junichi (still active), married Shigemoto Naomi, former member of Osaka Performance Doll, in March 2003. They have one son and one daughter together.

Koide (still active), got married in 2004. He has three children and won the "Best Father in Kansai" award in 2019.

Ehara Masahiro (still active), married an office worker in November 2009. They have five children (the first born on April 29, 2010 and the most recent born on July 9, 2021) and they run a Family YouTube Channel.

Kikuchi Kosuke (still active), got married in 2010. He announced that he has two daughters on July 31, 2013.

Yagi Masumi (still active), married a non-celebrity woman named "Mari" on March 14, 2012.

Rossy (still active), married a dental hygienist on April 18, 2013.

Iwahashi Yoshimasa (still active), married a former childcare worker on April 1, 2014.

Unagi Kazuhiro (still active), married a non-celebrity on August 5, 2015. His wife had their first child, a son, on June 19, 2018.

Tanaka Single (still active), married a non-celebrity woman in her 20s in February 2017. He later announced that their first child was born in October 2016.

Ogata Takahiro (still active), married a non-celebrity named "Ai" on March 9, 2017.

Saito Tsukasa (still active), married a non-celebrity woman on December 24, 2017. They have two children together.

Obata no Oniisan (still active), married TV announcer Yamasaki Yuki on March 29, 2018.

Nadagi Takeshi (still active), married stage actress Watanabe Anri on September 2, 2020.

Miaki Riho married fellow member Shunshun Clinic P (still active) in 2020.

Otake (still active), married a non-celebrity woman on March 31, 2021.

Yamamoto Keiichi announced his marriage to former AKB48 member Nishino Miki on November 22, 2022.

SNH48 members

Kang Xin, first former member of SNH48 to marry. She got married on March 30, 2015. She had two sons.

Zeng YuJia, got married on October 7, 2016.

Yu HuiWen, married Dante Zeng on February 15, 2019

He SuKun†, got married on October, 2019.

Luo Lan, got married on August 18, 2019.

Li MeiQi, got married on May 11, 2022.

Chen JiaYing, got married on November 13, 2022.

BEJ48 members

Huang YanFei, first former member of BEJ48 to marry. She got married on March 13, 2024.

GNZ48 members

Zhang XinYu, got married on August, 2018.

Zuo JiaXin, got married on May 10, 2021.
